Package org.mini2dx.breakout

Class BreakoutGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.screen.BasicGameScreen
      • org.mini2dx.breakout.BreakoutGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.mini2Dx.core.screen.GameScreen
    public class BreakoutGame
extends org.mini2Dx.core.screen.BasicGameScreen

    Breakout Game

    Breakout game implements an application from mini2DX engine.

    In this game we added more effect and function for user friendly and make game more interesting.

    Since:
    2019-12-04
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    610615011, 610615016, 610615020
